title: Gobsmacked
description: Alternate title: "Mark and Tony"No more Mr. Nice Guy.Mild mannered Mark Meehan’s good judgment flies out the window when he finds his lover banging another man. Things go from bad to worse as Mark’s crazy revenge scheme uncovers shocking secrets—sending him straight into the arms of hunky lawman and old friend, Tony Gervase, a man of limited patience and secrets of his own.
author: L.B. Gregg
